name: Super Valhalla Hockey 2016
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Super Valhalla Hockey is a multiplayer game starring the most violent ice hockey players: the Vikings! Any action on the field may release the wrath of the opposite team's supporters and their gods. They might even come onto the ice to take part in the brawl...

Platform: PC / Engine: Unreal Engine 4
Number of players: 2 or 4

Producer : Vincent VIDAL
Game Design : Vincent HUET
Game Art : Camille HOARAU, Meryl MARIATTE, Alexandre MERCIER and Thibaut RISLER
Game Design & Programming : Jérôme LE NAOU
Game Programming : Quentin DESPINOY and Jérémy HOLTZMANN
Music & Sound Design : Elio GERMANI
